TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolboxBitmapAttribute extends System.Attribute
.class public auto ansi ToolboxBitmapAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 这使您可以指定一个图标来表示容器的控件，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 窗体设计器。

span.span: Allows you to specify an icon to represent a control in a container, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将应用于 控件，使容器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio 窗体设计器）可以检索表示控件的图标。You can apply a to a control so that containers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer, can retrieve an icon that represents the control. 图标位图可以单独位于文件中，也可以嵌入到包含控件的程序集中。The bitmap for the icon can be in a file by itself or embedded in the assembly that contains the control. 嵌入到控件的程序集 (或存储在单独文件中的位图的大小) 应为 16 x 16。The size of the bitmap that you embed in the control's assembly (or store in a separate file) should be 16 by 16. 对象的方法 可以返回小 16 x 16 映像，或返回通过缩放小图像创建的大型 32 x 32 映像。The method of a object can return the small 16 by 16 image or a large 32 by 32 image that it creates by scaling the small image. 若要将其他版本的图标用于不同版本的程序集，您无需修改每个版本的 。If you want to use different versions of your icons with different versions of your assembly, you do not have to modify the for each version. 相反，您可使用 或 声明此程集，并为每个程序集版本指定一个 配置值。Instead, you can declare the assembly with a or a , and specify a configuration value for each assembly version. 在此情况下，使用追加的位图后缀来解释由 表示的文件名。In this case, a file name indicated by a is interpreted with the bitmap suffix appended. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 将类设置为的 `stop.bmp` 工具箱图标 `StopSignControl` 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to set `stop.bmp` as the toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl`. 此示例假设存在名为 c：的 16 x 16 像素的位图 `stop.bmp` \\ 。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `stop.bmp` at c:\\. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new object.

span.span: Initializes a new object with an image from a specified file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数将设置 `stop.bmp` 为的工具箱图标 `StopSignControl` 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set `stop.bmp` as the toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl`. 此示例假设存在名为 c：的 16 x 16 像素的位图 `stop.bmp` \\ 。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `stop.bmp` at c:\\. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

span.span: A whose defining assembly is searched for the bitmap resource.

summary.span: 基于作为资源嵌入到指定程序集的一个 16 × 16 位图初始化新的 对象。

span.span: Initializes a new object based on a 16 x 16 bitmap that is embedded as a resource in a specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在定义参数指定的类型的程序集中搜索嵌入的资源 `t` 。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 构造函数搜索名为 namespace.classname.bmp 的资源，其中 namespace 是包含参数指定的类的定义的命名空间 `t` 。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.classname.bmp, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，如果 ControlA 在 AssemblyA.dll 的 NamespaceA 中，则构造函数将在 AssemblyA.dll 中搜索名为 NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp 的资源。For example, if ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数将按钮控件的图标设置为名为的 "工具箱" 图标 `StopSignControl3` 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set the icon of the button control to the toolbox icon for a named `StopSignControl3`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在定义参数指定的类型的程序集中搜索嵌入的资源 `t` 。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 此构造函数搜索名为 namespace.name 的资源，其中 namespace 是包含由 `t` 参数指定的类的定义的命名空间。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.name, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假设 ControlA 是 NamespaceA 中的一个类 AssemblyA.dll，并将 "MyBitmap.bmp" 传递给 `name` 参数。For example, suppose that ControlA is a class in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll and that you passed "MyBitmap.bmp" to the `name` parameter. 然后，构造函数搜索名为 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 的资源 AssemblyA.dll。Then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. ## Examples "下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数将设置 `StopSignControl2.bmp` 为的工具箱图标 `StopSignControl2` 。'The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set `StopSignControl2.bmp` as a toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl2`. 此示例假设存在一个名为的 16 x 16 像素位图 `StopSignControl2.bmp` ，其 **BuildAction** 属性设置为 **EmbeddedResource**。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `StopSignControl2.bmp` with its **BuildAction** property set to **EmbeddedResource**. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索名为 namespace.classname.bmp 的资源，其中 namespace 是包含由参数指定的对象类型定义的命名空间 `component` 。This method searches for a resource named namespace.classname.bmp, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the type of the object specified by the `component` parameter. 例如，假设将类型为 ControlA 的对象传递给 `component` 参数。For example, suppose you pass an object of type ControlA to the `component` parameter. 如果 ControlA 在 AssemblyA.dll 的 NamespaceA 中，则此方法将在 AssemblyA.dll 中搜索名为 NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp 的资源。If ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then this method searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp. 如果此 对象还没有大图像，则此方法将通过缩放小图像来创建大图像。If this object does not already have a large image, this method creates a large image by scaling the small image.

returns.span: 基于检索到的位图的 对象。

span.span: An object based on the retrieved bitmap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索名为 imgName 的资源，其中 namespace 是包含参数指定的类型定义的命名空间。 `t`This method searches for a resource named namespace.imgName, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the type specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假设将 typeof (ControlA) 传递给 `t` 参数，并将 "MyBitmap.bmp" 传递给 imgName 参数。For example, suppose you pass typeof(ControlA) to the `t` parameter and you pass "MyBitmap.bmp" to the imgName parameter. 如果 ControlA 在 AssemblyA.dll 的 NamespaceA 中，则此方法将在 AssemblyA.dll 中搜索名为 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 的资源。If ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then this method searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. 此方法用于检索嵌入到程序集中的 16 x 16 位图资源。This method is intended to retrieve a 16 x 16 bitmap resource that is embedded in an assembly. 但是，不要求嵌入的位图的大小为 16 x 16。However, there is no requirement that the embedded bitmap has a size of 16 x 16. 从程序集检索的位图 (无论) 哪些大小被视为小图像。The bitmap that is retrieved from the assembly (no matter what size) is considered the small image. 通过将 "小" 图像缩放到大小 32 x 32 来创建大图像。The large image is created by scaling the "small" image to a size of 32 x 32. 因此，无论从程序集检索的位图大小如何，大图像都将始终为 32 32。So the large image will always be 32 by 32, regardless of the size of the bitmap retrieved from the assembly.
